name: Star Keeper (COMMA Studio, Egor_Cool09, Gandelianna)
description:
Our team:

Pavel Simonenko - gamedesigner

Egor Ignakhin - programmer

Alexandra Vlasyuk - 3D modeller, compositor, scenario

Mikhail Samylin - 3D modeller

Timur Bikkulov - compositor

There are three stars in our game, and you should help each of them in correct order. Red star must be in great danger, yellow can wait a little, and white star used to start recovery process after Space is saved.

On Red star you should fix the pipe (click the red button (E), then take pipe(hold F). You have 30 sec) 

Yellow Star: it is necessary to put the branches of the tree in the order of the seasons, starting from winter. 

White star: you need to mix the bubbles in the correct order. Which one? “ Richard Of York…”

Controls: WASD 

Interact: E/F (E is for red button on the first star) 

To leave star: Y
